chat.message: Hi, I am your personal assistant. You can ask me anything about rising sounds, hashtags, popular hooks, and more... Here are some example questions:
chat.button8: Time for posting in my country?
chat.button9: Hashtags in category Business in my country?
chat.outOfRequests: You have run out of requests in your current package, buy a subscription to increase your limits ðŸ˜”
chat.loginToUse: For using AI assistant - log-in into the system!
chat.noConnection: The AI assistant is currently reviewing all the new content. In the meantime, you can try the following features:

400.1.title: Sorry for the inconvenience
400.1.text: We are currently unavailable updating AI components. Please try again later.

400.2.title: Request is too lengthy
400.2.text: Your request is too lengthy. It will be available later in your history.

400.3.title: Invalid URL
400.3.text: The URL you entered is invalid. Please check and try again.

400.4.title: Oops! Something went wrong
400.4.text: We are working on getting this fixed as soon as we can.

400.5.title: Creator not found
400.5.text: This creator is not found. Please search him on advanced search.

400.6.title: Audio Too Short
400.6.text: Audio must be at least 1 minute in duration.

403.1.title: Limitation
403.1.text: Access detailed insights by selecting your plan and activating your trial today.

401.1.title: Authorization
401.1.text: You are not authorized to access this page. Please log in and try again.

471.title: Long video
471.text: The video exceeds 15 minutes in length and cannot be processed. Please try again with a shorter video.

524.title: Timeout occurred
524.text: The request took too long to process. Please try again later.

duplicate.title: Duplicate account
duplicate.text: This TikTok account is already linked. Please select a different one.
